title: Tuck Bike literally reinvents the wheel w/ full size folding bike AND folding wheels!
content:
File this under things I didn’t expect to be writing about today—a full-size folding bike that also includes folding wheels. That’s right, the new Tuck Bike has wheels (and tires) that fold up into thirds. That makes it possible to create a full-size bike that folds down into the size of a compact folder with much

The post Tuck Bike literally reinvents the wheel w/ full size folding bike AND folding wheels! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
